name: Aquaphobia
description: This hero cannot use Potion tokens.

name: System Shock
description: Occupies a card slot. No other effect.

name: Amnesia
description: Place on Hero card. This Hero loses his natural ability.

name: Accident Prone
description: This Hero suffers 1 Wound if his attack deals no Wounds.

name: Dazed and Confused
description: If this Hero suffers at least 1 Wound
